link.title: Ross Valley Charter, a public TK-5 learning community in Fairfax, California

meta.name: description
meta.content: Ross Valley Charter at White Hill: a free public school offering progressive education in a multi-age environment for TK-5th grade at the White Hill campus.
Ross Valley Charter - A welcoming learning community
Ross Valley Charter is a public elementary school located in Fairfax, California. Using progressive teaching techniques in a multi-age setting, RVC creates confident, inspired learners.

article.class: fl-post post-14289 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.p: Marin County has aligned with six Bay Area county health officers and county superintendents of schools to make a unified, regional decision to close school campuses through the end of the school year. The campus grounds and playground are closed to the public as well. RVC continues to provide instruction through distance learning. Please read your newsletter for detailed information and wash your hands!
div.div: El condado de Marín y los oficiales de salud del Área de la Bahía como también los superintendentes de las escuelas, tomaron la decisión de cerrar los planteles escolares hasta el final del año escolar. Los patios escolares también están cerrados al público. RVC continuará brindando instrucciones atravez del aprendizaje a distancia. Lea su boletín informativo para obtener más información detallada. Y recuerde siempre lavarse las manos. Gracias y cuídense.

div.class: fl-row fl-row-full-width fl-row-bg-photo fl-node-58a7fd52d4847 fl-row-custom-height fl-row-align-center

p.span: We are now accepting applications for Fall of 2020.
Join us on a tour to find out more about our school. Click here to sign up.

Ross Valley Charter is a unique public school where curiosity is nurtured and there are endless opportunities for joy in the classroom. Our inquiry-based program empowers students to master material as they explore their interests and share their knowledge with the school community. Read about our program or join us on a tour to learn more.

img.alt: Ross Valley Charter is conducting tours of our campus for families interested in progressive education. Clicking this button will take you to the "request a tour" form.
img.title: Part of the Ross Valley Charter icon

div.p: Our inquiry based, student-centered approach engages each student’s curiosity and encourages learners to build knowledge and understanding through hands-on experiences. RVC students share their knowledge with others, deepening their understanding and building confidence. Our arts-integrated program has students singing, creating, and performing as part of the classroom experience. Our multi-faceted approach to engaging and supporting students is designed to ensure that they thrive in school and beyond.

p.span: "It's a place where the kids are allowed to discover what they're made of."

a.span: We’re Going on a Bear Hunt.... thank you to our

img.alt: We’re Going on a Bear Hunt.... thank you to our amazing art teacher, Mrs. Wilcox. The story, drawing our bears, and sewing stuffed bears was a very fun art project for many of our kiddos this week! #distancelearning #artheals #arttherapy #bearhunt #lookforthebears #bearstyle

a.span: 5th grade poetry inspiration for you today...Court

img.alt: 5th grade poetry inspiration for you today...Courtesy of Hanaleia 🌼 #daffodils🌼 #spring #poetry #distancelearning #creativekids

a.span: Our teachers (as per usual) are going above and be

img.alt: Our teachers (as per usual) are going above and beyond to help/connect/deliver the best in learning to our kiddos @rossvalleycharter 💙 But, it’s not the same - we love being a community and working together. For now, we make this work, we model resilience to our students, we take one day at a time and we remain committed to whole child education. Even from a distance. #makingitwork #stayingconnected #wholechild #supporteachchild #oneonone #virtuallearning #distancelearning #resilience

a.span: ENROLL NOW. We still have a couple of spaces left

img.alt: ENROLL NOW. We still have a couple of spaces left in our program for Fall of 2020. If you are interested in our multi age, inquiry-based, social emotional, whole child approach head on over to our website and fill out the application now. #applynowforfall #inquirybasedlearning #socialemotionallearning #wholechildeducation #multiageclassroom

a.span: A beautiful and timely quote by Fairfax’s own, A

img.alt: A beautiful and timely quote by Fairfax’s own, Anne Lamott...so, let’s heed this wise advice and unplug (as much as possible!) during the Spring Break week ahead. It’s been a crazy couple of weeks. And, per our fearless leader, Director Luke, get some fresh air and exercise too! #noschoolthisweek #distancelearning #unplug #catchupweek #springbreak #putonthebrakes #freshairtherapy #sunontheway #rossvalleycharter #inquirybasedlearning

a.span: During these challenging times, we want you to kno

img.alt: During these challenging times, we want you to know how #grateful we are for our families and community at large. We hope you are finding special moments of gratitude, as well. There are so many unknowns but one thing is not: Gratitude helps people feel more positive emotions, relish good experiences, improve their health, deal with adversity, and build strong relationships. #thinkingofyou #findamoment #gratitudeistheattitude #mindfulpractice #gratefulforourcommunity

a.span: Enroll Now...we are still accepting applications f

img.alt:
Enroll Now...we are still accepting applications for Fall of 2020. Our Multi-Age, Inquiry Based Learning program, with a strong emphasis on social/emotional learning, is a sight to behold. Be Curious. Applications found here (and on our website): https://fs22.formsite.com/RVCS/rvwb8s5lv4/index.html
#curiositypowered #multiage #inquirybasedlearning #wholechildapproach #applynowforfall

a.span: All of us here at Ross Valley Charter are hoping o

img.alt: All of us here at Ross Valley Charter are hoping our friends, families and community members are staying safe and healthy. #stayhome #besafe #community #wecare #wecandohardthingstogether

a.span: We’re Going on a Bear Hunt.... thank you to our

img.alt: We’re Going on a Bear Hunt.... thank you to our amazing art teacher, Mrs. Wilcox. The story, drawing our bears, and sewing stuffed bears was a very fun art project for many of our kiddos this week! #distancelearning #artheals #arttherapy #bearhunt #lookforthebears #bearstyle

a.span: 5th grade poetry inspiration for you today...Court

img.alt: 5th grade poetry inspiration for you today...Courtesy of Hanaleia 🌼 #daffodils🌼 #spring #poetry #distancelearning #creativekids

a.span: Our teachers (as per usual) are going above and be

img.alt: Our teachers (as per usual) are going above and beyond to help/connect/deliver the best in learning to our kiddos @rossvalleycharter 💙 But, it’s not the same - we love being a community and working together. For now, we make this work, we model resilience to our students, we take one day at a time and we remain committed to whole child education. Even from a distance. #makingitwork #stayingconnected #wholechild #supporteachchild #oneonone #virtuallearning #distancelearning #resilience

a.title: Inquiry-Based Learning Yields Big Dividends for Kids

img.alt: Ross Valley Charter California state test scores higher than RVSD, Marin County, and California

a.title: Inquiry-Based Learning Yields Big Dividends for Kids

h4.a: Inquiry-Based Learning Yields Big Dividends for Kids

h2.span: Ross Valley Charter is a public elementary school in Fairfax, California.

p.span: At Ross Valley Charter, it is our mission to understand and support the unique social, emotional and academic needs of every child. In addition to the classroom teachers, our staff includes a Special Education Teacher, an Intervention Specialist, and a bilingual Family Outreach and Support Coordinator. Students also receive Spanish, art, music and physical education every week.
Our campus offers plenty of outdoor learning and play space, and convenient access to nearby open space, where our students take hikes, read, sing, and write out of doors.

span.strong: Click here to schedule a tour.

div.a: Click here for Board meeting agendas

p.a: To file a Complaint, use the form linked here

To file a Williams Act complaint,
use the form linked here

form.title: Type and press Enter to search.

div.div:
Ross Valley Charter is a free, public school authorized by the State of California Department of Education that offers an exceptional, inquiry-based learning experience. Our campus, located in the Ross Valley School District, is a wonderful choice for students in Transitional Kindergarten through 5th grade. California. Find out about our program by watching our videos.
Sitemap +
